entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
